create_project_conflict.en: A project with this name already exists. Please choose another name.
create_project_conflict.de: Es existiert bereits ein Projekt mit diesem Namen. Bitte wählen Sie einen anderen Namen.
create_project_conflict.zh: 已经存在此名称的项目。请选择其他名称。
create_project_conflict.pt: Um projeto com este nome já existe. Por favor escolha outro nome

create_project_non_container_hint.en: The chosen schema is not a container. You will not be able to create other nodes in this project.
create_project_non_container_hint.de: Das gewählte Schema is kein Container. Sie werden in diesem Projekt keine anderen Nodes erstellen können.
create_project_non_container_hint.zh: 所选数据模型不是容器。你将无法在该项目中创建其他数据节点。
create_project_non_container_hint.pt: O esquema escolhido não é um contentor. Não conseguirá criar outos nós neste projeto

create_project_anonymous_access.en: Allow anonymous users to read contents
create_project_anonymous_access.de: Erlaube anonymen Benutzern Inhalte zu lesen
create_project_anonymous_access.zh: 允许匿名用户读取数据内容
create_project_anonymous_access.pt: Permitir a utilizadores anónimos a leitura de conteúdos

delete_project_body.en: Are you sure you want to delete project "{{ name }}"?
delete_project_body.de: Sind Sie sicher, dass sie Projekt "{{ name }}" löschen wollen?
delete_project_body.zh: 你确定要删除项目 "{{ name }}" 吗？
delete_project_body.pt: Tem a certeza de querer apagar o projeto "{{ name }}"?

delete_node_body.en: Are you sure you want to delete this node "{{ name }}"?
delete_node_body.de: Sind Sie sicher, dass sie die Node "{{ name }}" löschen wollen?
delete_node_body.zh: 你确定要删除这个节点 "{{ name }}" 吗？
delete_node_body.pt: Tem a certeza de querer apagar o nó "{{ name }}"?

node_conflict_description.en: Your changes conflict with the saved version on the server.
node_conflict_description.de: Ihre Änderungen würden Änderungen am Server überschreiben.
node_conflict_description.zh: 你的更改与服务器上保存的版本冲突。
node_conflict_description.pt: As suas alterações entram em conflito com a versão gravada no servidor

file_too_large_body.en: The file {{ fileName }} is too large to upload. Please choose a smaller file or change the upload limit in the configuration.
file_too_large_body.de: Die Datei {{ fileName }} ist zu groß zum Hochladen. Bitte wählen Sie eine kleinere Datei, oder ändern Sie das Upload-Limit in der Konfiguration.
file_too_large_body.zh: 上传的文件 {{ fileName }} 太大。请选择一个较小的文件，或更改配置中的上传限制。
file_too_large_body.pt: O ficheiro {{ fileName }} é demasiado grande para ser carregado. Por favor escolha um ficheiro mais pequeno ou altere o limite de carregamento na configuração.
